rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports costs factually ('estimated the cost... was more than $1 billion') without high-potency framing.
The segment does not contain a question.
Reports negative economic impact; lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes financial impact/cost, not capability or reassurance.
Reports economic metrics ('cost... more than $1 billion', '$879 million', '$200 million') using standard language ('estimated the cost was').
